name: 卡洛·沙特里安
name_full: 卡洛·沙特里安 Carlo Chatrian

last_movies.title: 第74届柏林国际电影节颁奖典礼

introduction: Carlo Chatrian (born 9 December 1971 in Turin, Italy) is a journalist, cinema critic and artistic director.Originally from Torgnon, Chatrian graduated in Literature and Philosophy from Turin University in 1994. As a film critic he works regularly for the magazines Filmcritica, Duellanti, Cineforum and is director of Panoramiques.Chatrian directed the Festival del film Locarno from 2012 to 2018 and the Berlin International Film Festival from 2020 to 2024. On September 18, 2024, Chatrian was appointed as the new director of the National Cinema Museum in Turin, for a five-year mandate.Chatrian has published numerous monographs on filmmakers such as Wong Kar Wai, Johan van der Keuken, Frederick Wiseman, Errol Morris, Maurizio Nichetti and Nanni Moretti.
